fact.description: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Costa Rica territory.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Costa Rica.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Costa Rica's half?
Ravshan Irmatov signals a throw-in for Netherlands, close to Costa Rica's area.
Throw-in for Netherlands close to the penalty box.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Costa Rica in their own half.
Netherlands's Robin van Persie is on target but unsuccessful.
Netherlands's Wesley Sneijder gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Netherlands's Memphis Depay is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Robin van Persie for Netherlands is whistled offside.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Free kick Costa Rica.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Throw-in Costa Rica.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
In Salvador Netherlands drive forward through Memphis Depay. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Ravshan Irmatov blows against Netherlands's Memphis Depay for offside.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Costa Rica.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Costa Rica.
Johnny Acosta (Costa Rica) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Free kick in a good position for Netherlands!
Costa Rica's Junior Diaz has been booked in Salvador.
Netherlands push forward through Wesley Sneijder, whose finish on goal is saved.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Netherlands have a dangerous throw-in.
Costa Rica needs to be cautious. Netherlands have an attacking throw-in.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Free kick Netherlands.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Costa Rica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Costa Rica in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Michael Umana (Costa Rica) has received a first yellow card.
Netherlands's Wesley Sneijder gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Fonte Nova.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Netherlands's half.
In Salvador Costa Rica's Joel Campbell is caught offside.
Free kick Netherlands.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Costa Rica defence as Robin van Persie fires in a strike for Netherlands.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Throw-in Costa Rica.
Can Netherlands capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Costa Rica's half?
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Costa Rica.
Christian Bolanos for Costa Rica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Ravshan Irmatov blows against Netherlands's Robin van Persie for offside.
Free kick Costa Rica.
Bruno Martins Indi (Netherlands) has received a yellow card from Ravshan Irmatov.
Giancarlo Gonzalez's header is off-target for Costa Rica.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Costa Rica's half?
Jorge Luis Pinto (Costa Rica) is making a first substitution, with Marcos Urena replacing Joel Campbell.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Netherlands's Robin van Persie has run offside.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Salvador to check on Cristian Gamboa, who is grimacing with pain.
The match is underway again.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cristian Gamboa has recovered and rejoins the match in Salvador.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Netherlands throw-in in Costa Rica's half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Netherlands attack but Ron Vlaar's header doesn't find the target.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Throw-in for Costa Rica at Arena Fonte Nova.
Netherlands make their first substitution with Jeremain Lens replacing Memphis Depay.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Costa Rica territory.
Dave Myrie (Costa Rica) has replaced the possibly injured Cristian Gamboa at Arena Fonte Nova.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Netherlands's Jeremain Lens is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Netherlands are in shooting range from this free kick.
Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) gets booked by Ravshan Irmatov, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Netherlands drive into the zone and Wesley Sneijder is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Free kick Netherlands.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Robin van Persie for Netherlands drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Netherlands throw-in in Costa Rica's half.
In Salvador Netherlands's Jeremain Lens is caught offside.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Netherlands drive forward but Jeremain Lens is judged offside.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the second half.
Costa Rica will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Netherlands.
Netherlands are coming forward and Stefan de Vrij gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Arjen Robben of Netherlands is pulled up for offside.
It's 0-0 at the end of normal time.
The first extra period has started.
Costa Rica needs to be cautious. Netherlands have an attacking throw-in.
Robin van Persie for Netherlands drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Robin van Persie of Netherlands smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
Arjen Robben of Netherlands is pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Ron Vlaar (Netherlands) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Keylor Navas is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ravshan Irmatov has blown to resume play in Salvador.
Keylor Navas is back on his feet again.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Fonte Nova.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Jose Cubero is on a sub for Yeltsin Tejeda for Costa Rica.
Costa Rica have a dangerous throw-in.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Robin van Persie for Netherlands is whistled offside.
Ball safe as Netherlands is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Costa Rica at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in Costa Rica.
In Salvador, Arjen Robben of Netherlands is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Netherlands's Arjen Robben gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Costa Rica defender.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Netherlands just outside Costa Rica's area.
Can Netherlands capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Costa Rica's half?
Netherlands drive upfield and Arjen Robben gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Costa Rica defender.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
The first half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Costa Rica's half?
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Throw-in for Costa Rica at Arena Fonte Nova.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Costa Rica's half?
It's 0-0 at the end of the first period.
Klaas Jan Huntelaar is replacing Bruno Martins Indi for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
The second extra period is just kicking-off.
Can Netherlands capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Johnny Acosta (Costa Rica) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a throw-in for Costa Rica, close to Netherlands's area.
Netherlands's Robin van Persie breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Klaas Jan Huntelaar (Netherlands) gets a yellow card.
Play has been resumed at Arena Fonte Nova.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Keylor Navas.
Keylor Navas for Costa Rica is back on the field again.
In Salvador Netherlands's Jeremain Lens is caught offside.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Christian Bolanos (Costa Rica) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Costa Rica have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Throw-in for Netherlands close to the penalty box.
Costa Rica drive forward and Marcos Urena gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jeremain Lens (Netherlands) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Costa Rica territory.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Netherlands apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Wesley Sneijder. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Throw-in Netherlands.
Dirk Kuyt (Netherlands) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ravshan Irmatov blows against Netherlands's Robin van Persie for offside.
Louis van Gaal is making the team's third substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Tim Krul replacing Jasper Cillessen.
Ravshan Irmatov will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the first half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Netherlands throw-in in Costa Rica's half.
It's 0-0 at the end of extra-time.
We are now ready for the penalty shootout!
The penalty shootout is over. The final score is 4-3.
